entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
